sections.heading: This Act shall be known and may be cited as the Minor Identification and Protection Act.
sections.text: This Act shall be known and may be cited as the Minor Identification and Protection Act.

sections.heading: For the purposes of this Act, unless the context otherwise
sections.text: requires, the terms used herein shall have the following meanings ascribed to them:

sections.heading: (a) Upon request of a parent or legal guardian of a minor and
sections.text:
the presentation of the minor at a local law enforcement agency, the local
law enforcement agency shall take a complete set of fingerprints of the
minor and issue a fingerprint identification card to the parent or guardian
which shall contain the fingerprints of such minor.
